General.Name: Xian Sunresin New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunresin New Materials Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sales of adsorption and separation materials, and exchange separation system devices in China. It offers adsorbent, catalyst, chelating, mixed bed ion exchange, powder, strong acid cation and anion exchange, and weak acid cation and anion exchange resins; chromatographic media; enzyme carriers; and solid phase peptide synthesis products. The company also provides Sepsolut, an ion exchange and adsorbent system and solution. Its products are used in food and beverage, bio-pharmaceutical and life science, plant extraction, civil and industry water treatment, chemical, hydrometallurgy and mining, and wastewater treatment and reuse industries. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.
